name: av_botz_update
description: A Pyrogram Telegram bot to Stream Telegram files to web. @bot_owner26

ENV.description: Set this to True if you don't want to crash the bot

APP_NAME.description: Copy-Paste the app name that you just typed above.

BIN_CHANNEL.description: The BIN Channel ID. Read the readme for more info about this var

LOG_CHANNEL.description: The log Channel ID.Add this to get new users log

DATABASE_URL.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

BANNED_CHANNELS.description: Put IDs of Banned Channels where bot will not work(bot will leave that channel). You can add multiple IDs & separate with Space.

BAN_CHNL.description: almost same as BANNED_CHANNELS but if u add channel id here then the bot will stay that channel but it will not gen straming link for that channel.

AUTH_PICS.description: Your Bot start cmd Pic from @AV_IMA_TO_URL_BOT

BOT_USERNAME.description: Enter your username without @  example  bot AV_F2L_BOT.

SLEEP_THRESHOLD.description: Floodwait Sleep timer. Read the readme for more info about this var

WORKERS.description: No. of workers that is to be assigned. Read the readme for more info about this var

PORT.description: Port that you want your webapp to be listened to. Read the readme for more info about this var

NO_PORT.description: If you don't want your port to be displayed. Read the readme for more info about this var

BIND_ADRESS.description: Read the readme for more info about this var  Leave Empty  For heroku

FQDN.description: Read the readme for more info about this var  **Leave Empty for heroku**

BAN_ALERT.description: [Optional] Add the text you wish to display when attempting to get links while banned.

PICS.description: Your Bot start cmd Pic from @AV_IMA_TO_URL_BOT
